title: Nordstrom’s Outrageous Summer Sale Has Thousands of Markdowns — Shop 8 Seriously Cute Pieces Under $100
text:
Ahh, how we love a good Nordstrom sale! And good news if you do too, because its Summer Sale is finally here! From now through September 8, shoppers can score up to 40 percent off everything from the cutest clothing to the most stylish shoes to the hottest handbags — and pieces are selling out faster than you can add them to your cart!

When we say these deals are outrageous, we really mean it. The beloved retailer has slashed prices on thousands of fashion finds from brands like Topshop, Madewell, and Something Navy, plus tons of designer styles from brands like Gucci, Max Mara, Givenchy, and more. To help get you started, we scoured Nordstrom to find eight of our favorite items from the epic Summer Sale — all under $100. Things we’re scooping up? This gorgeous cut-out midi dress from Bardot, a vintage-inspired pair of high-waist jeans from Madewell, these ultra-cool white peep-toe mules from Topshop, and a trendy chain link bracelet from Argento Vivo. Keep scrolling to shop more of our top picks!
